data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Juventus with the kick-off.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a free kick to Juventus.
In the minute 2, Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Adrien Rabiot (Juventus) has received a yellow card from Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο.
Throw-in for Genoa close to the penalty box.
In the minute 3, Genoa are in shooting range from this free kick.
Genoa's Stefano Sturaro gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Juventus defender.
Ball safe as Juventus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 6, Goal kick for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
Free kick for Juventus in the half of Genoa.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a Genoa throw-in in Juventus's half.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Juventus in their own half.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Throw-in for Juventus in the half of Genoa.
In the minute 10, Juventus have been awarded a corner by Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο.
Juventus push forward at Luigi Ferraris and Weston McKennie gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Genoa defence.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
In the minute 11, Juventus's Leonardo Bonucci attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Genoa goal kick.
Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 13, Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 15, Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Luigi Ferraris, Edoardo Goldaniga has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in Genoa.
Genoa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Juventus's Rodrigo Bentancur misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 18, It's a goal kick for the home team in Genoa.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο.
In the minute 25, Juventus are coming forward and Weston McKennie gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Genoa have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 27, Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο awards Genoa a goal kick.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
Juventus to take a throw-in in Genoa territory.
In the minute 31, Can Juventus capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Genoa's half?
Can Juventus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
Corner awarded to Juventus.
In the minute 36, Juventus have been awarded a corner by Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο.
Juventus drive upfield and Cristiano Ronaldo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Genoa defender.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
In the minute 38, Ball safe as Genoa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Luca Pellegrini for Genoa who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Genoa's Luca Pellegrini is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 41, Juventus pushes forward through Cristiano Ronaldo, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick Juventus.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο.
In the minute 43, Weston McKennie's header is off-target for Juventus.
Goal kick for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
Throw-in for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 43, Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Genoa drive forward but Stefano Sturaro is judged offside.
Juventus have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Juventus's Paulo Dybala gets in a shot on goal at Luigi Ferraris. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway. Genoa with the kick-off.
In the minute 47, Juventus are pushing forward but Cristiano Ronaldo's finish is wide of the goal.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο awards Genoa a goal kick.
In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Genoa in the half of Juventus.
Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Genoa needs to be cautious. Juventus have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 51, Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο awards the home team a throw-in.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a free kick to Genoa.
Throw-in for Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 53, Can Genoa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juventus's half?
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a throw-in for Juventus, close to Genoa's area.
Throw-in high up the field for Juventus in Genoa.
In the minute 54, Genoa will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Juventus.
Cristiano Ronaldo for the away team is judged to be offside.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
In the minute 56, Throw-in high up the field for Juventus in Genoa.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a Juventus throw-in in Genoa's half.
Paulo Dybala scores to make it 0-1 at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 57, Weston McKennie with an assist there.
Genoa to take a throw-in in Juventus territory.
Throw-in for Genoa in the half of Juventus.
In the minute 59, Cristiano Ronaldo for Juventus is whistled offside.
Can Genoa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Juventus's half?
In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 61, Genoa to take a throw-in in Juventus territory.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Stefano Sturaro.
That's a fine assist from Luca Pellegrini.
In the minute 63, Cristiano Ronaldo (Juventus) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο.
Juan Cuadrado for Juventus drives towards goal at Luigi Ferraris. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Juventus in the half of Genoa.
Juventus have a dangerous throw-in.
Juventus's Paulo Dybala has run offside.
In the minute 67, Genoa make their first substitution with Valon Behrami replacing Stefano Sturaro.
The home team replace Gianluca Scamacca with Mattia Destro.
The away team have replaced Adrien Rabiot with Alvaro Morata. This is the first substitution made today by Andrea Pirlo.
In the minute 68, In Genoa Genoa drive forward through Nicolo Rovella. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Can Juventus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
Throw-in Genoa.
In the minute 69, Genoa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a Genoa throw-in in Juventus's half.
Throw-in for Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Genoa.
Juventus push upfield and Cristiano Ronaldo gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Genoa defence.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 73, Eldor Shomurodov is replacing Marko Pjaca for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 76, Juventus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Juventus have been given a penalty at Luigi Ferraris...
Weston McKennie (Juventus) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 78, It's advantage Juventus in Genoa as Cristiano Ronaldo scores from the spot to make it 1-2.
Juventus needs to be cautious. Genoa have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Genoa close to the penalty box.
In the minute 81, Weston McKennie for Juventus gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Genoa have a goal kick.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Juventus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 82, Giuseppe Caso is replacing Nicolo Rovella for the home team.
Rolando Maran is making the team's fifth substitution at Luigi Ferraris with Goran Pandev replacing Ivan Radovanovic.
In the minute 83, Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Rodrigo Bentancur is booked for the away team.
Andrea Pirlo (Juventus) is making a second substitution, with Dejan Kulusevski replacing Paulo Dybala.
Throw-in Juventus.
In the minute 84, Federico Bernardeschi is on a sub for Federico Chiesa for Juventus.
In Genoa Juventus attack through Alex Sandro. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 85, Ball goes out of play for a Genoa goal kick.
Juventus have been given a penalty...
Genoa's Mattia Perin has been booked in Genoa.
In the minute 89, Cristiano Ronaldo gives Juventus a 1-3 lead from the penalty spot.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Free kick Genoa.
Throw-in for Juventus at Luigi Ferraris.
Genoa have a dangerous throw-in.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Genoa close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Juventus at Luigi Ferraris.
Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο signals a free kick to Juventus.
Full-time! The final score is 1-3.
Juventus make their fourth substitution with Radu Matei Dragusin replacing Matthijs De Ligt.
Mattia Bani for Genoa has been booked by Μάρκο Ντι Μπέλο and receives a first yellow card.
